title: Negotiated
description: I’m no stranger to acquisitions. As the lead attorney for Entertainment Management Worldwide, I’ve done it a hundred times. What’s brand-new in this deal is her . The gorgeous, sexy Scarlett Davis, CFO of The Agency. Always in control. Always in charge. Always composed. But she has a secret… And so do I. When she finds out who I really am, she might never forgive me. Unless we can negotiate.
author: Marni Mann
